code: import React from"react";import{SRLWrapper}from"simple-react-lightbox";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{Col,Container,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import PortfolioOne from"./PortfolioOne";import data from"../../data/product.json";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Portfolio(){var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SRLWrapper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"portfolio",className:"portfolio",style:{marginTop:"5rem",padding:"0rem 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{"data-aos":"fade-up",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t("ÜRÜNLERİMİZ")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:data.map(function(product){var picture=product.picture,nav=product.nav,id=product.id;var title=t(product.title);var desc=t(product.desc);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:3,className:"text-center mb-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioOne,{picture:picture,title:title,desc:desc,nav:nav})},id);})})]})})});}export default Portfolio;
